channel.title: RefactorFirst
channel.description: Articles and tutorials about Java, Spring Boot, Kubernetes, Docker, Software Development, and Programming. Learn about what is new in programming and look into how to optimize and write clean code.

item.description: In this quick article, we will look at how you can mimic the behavior of communicating with AWS locally using LocalStack with docker-compose.
item.author: contact@refactorfirst.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Spring Cloud AWS 3.0 S3 with Spring Boot and Localstack
item.description: In this article, we will look into how we can use Spring Cloud AWS S3 in a Spring Boot Application to communicate with AWS. We will run our setup with LocalStack to mock the actual AWS S3 service
item.author: contact@refactorfirst.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Kick Start Spring Boot On AWS Lambda with Snap Start
item.description: We will look into how we can create an AWS Lambda with Terraform and run a Spring Boot application to view its performance with the Snap Start option enabled
item.author: contact@refactorfirst.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: How to Fetch Database Secrets From AWS Secrets Manager in a Spring Boot Application
item.description: In this article we will look into how we can fetch secrets from AWS Secrets Manager in a Spring Boot Application.
item.author: contact@refactorfirst.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Using DynamoDB with Spring Boot
item.description: In this article, we will look into how can communicate with AWS DynamoDB using a Spring Boot application and also understand some of the key concepts of DynamoDB.
item.author: contact@refactorfirst.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Micronaut JPA Application Performance on AWS Lambda
item.description: In this article, we would be looking into how we can deploy a Micronaut application providing GET, PUT and POST which can be called using an API Gateway and check its performance
item.author: contact@refactorfirst.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Micronaut JPA Function Performance on AWS Lambda
item.description: In this article, we would be looking into some performance statistics when running a Micronaut Application on a JVM runtime versus a Native image on AWS Lambda function
item.author: contact@refactorfirst.com (Amrut Prabhu)
